mdRecord.dcterms:description: Initials and expression of fraternity loyalty and of opposition. Drawing of Orion constellation using wallboard holes. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
LCJ | ZΨ till I die ← Might be sooner than you think | Finals 2016 |
